text: Huwa Al-Ladhi 'Anzala `Alayka Al-Kitaba Minhu 'Ayatun Muhkamatun Hunna 'Ummu Al-Kitabi Wa 'Ukharu Mutashabihatun Fa'amma Al-Ladhina Fi Qulubihim Zayghun Fayattabi`una Ma Tashabaha Minhu Abtigha'a Al-Fitnati Wa Abtigha'a Ta'wilihi Wa Ma Ya`lamu Ta'wilahu 'Illa Allahu Wa Ar-Rasikhuna Fi Al-`Ilmi Yaquluna 'Amanna Bihi Kullun Min `Indi Rabbina Wa Ma Yadhakkaru 'Illa 'Ulu Al-'Albabi
